sentence.Network_en: The past was erased, the erasure was forgotten, the lie became truth.
sentence.Network_cn: 过去给人擦拭个干净, 擦拭的行为又忘了个干净,于是, 谎言就变成了真理.

sentence.Network_en: The inspection, modification, replacement or erasure of part of file's contents.
sentence.Network_cn: 检查 、 修改 、 代替或擦去文档内容一部分的过程.

sentence.Network_en: Your writing would be subject to 1984 - style retroactive erasure.
sentence.Network_cn: 你所写的将会遭到1984年的风格反动的删去.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 的擦除（erasure），对于一个无上限的通配符就是 “capture#337 of ?” 表示什么？
军用计算机安全术语 ... 3.1.71 环境 environment 3.1.72 抹除 erasure 3.1.73 执行态 execution state.
专业音频术语中英文对照 ... Erasing 擦除，清洗 Erasure 抹音 Erase 消除，消.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... overmeasure 过量，剩余 erasure 擦掉，擦痕 cocksure 过分自信的，独断的.

list.abs: optical echo 光回波optical erasure 光学消除optical excitation 光激励
partial earth 部分接地partial erasure 部分擦除partial exposure 部分出刃
erasing knife 刮刀erasure signal 消除信号erasure 消去
erasure channel 删除通道erasure locator 删除定位子、疑符定位子erasure signal 清除信号

entry.def: The erasure of something is the removal, loss, or destruction of it.

example.ex: ...a further erasure of the UK's thin manufacturing base.
example.tran: 对英国制造业薄弱基础的进一步破坏

example.ex: ...the final and cataclysmic erasure of all the remaining dinosaurs 65 million years ago.
example.tran: 6,500万年前所有残存恐龙的最终灾难性灭绝

sentences.sentence: "there were many erasures in the typescript"

means.word_mean: 2. a surface area where something has been erased;

sentences.sentence: "another word had been written over the erasure"

means.word_mean: 3. deletion by an act of expunging or erasing
